name: ossp-uuid
description:
OSSP uuid is a ISO-C:1999 application programming interface (API) and
corresponding command line interface (CLI) for the generation of DCE
1.1, ISO/IEC 11578:1996 and RFC 4122 compliant Universally Unique
Identifier (UUID).

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependent_to.name: babeltrace
dependent_to.description:
Babeltrace is a trace viewer and converter reading and writing the
Common Trace Format (CTF). Its main use is to pretty-print CTF traces
into a human-readable text output ordered by time.

dependent_to.name: python
dependent_to.description: The Python programming language.

dependent_to.name: xeus
dependent_to.description: QuantStack C++ implementation of Jupyter kernel protocol

dependent_to.name: openbabel
dependent_to.description:
Open Babel is a chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of
chemical data. It's an open, collaborative project allowing anyone to
search, convert, analyze, or store data from molecular modeling,
chemistry, solid-state materials, biochemistry, or related areas.

dependent_to.name: xfsprogs
dependent_to.description: XFS User Tools.

dependent_to.name: nfs-utils
dependent_to.description:
The NFS Utilities package contains the userspace server and client tools
necessary to use the kernel's NFS abilities. NFS is a protocol that
allows sharing file systems over the network.

dependent_to.name: netdata
dependent_to.description: Real-time performance monitoring, done right!

dependent_to.name: task
dependent_to.description: Feature-rich console based todo list manager

dependent_to.name: open-iscsi
dependent_to.description:
The Open-iSCSI project is a high-performance, transport independent,
multi-platform implementation of RFC3720 iSCSI.

dependent_to.name: apr
dependent_to.description: Apache portable runtime.

dependent_to.name: zfs
dependent_to.description:
OpenZFS is an advanced file system and volume manager which was
originally developed for Solaris and is now maintained by the OpenZFS
community. This repository contains the code for running OpenZFS on
Linux and FreeBSD.

dependent_to.name: scitokens-cpp
dependent_to.description:
A C++ implementation of the SciTokens library with a C library
interface. SciTokens provide a token format for distributed
authorization.

dependent_to.name: libdap4
dependent_to.description:
libdap4 is is a c++ library to serve as a client for the OPeNDAP
framework that simplifies all aspects of scientific data networking and
provides software which makes local data accessible to remote locations
regardless of local storage format.

dependent_to.name: glvis
dependent_to.description: GLVis: an OpenGL tool for visualization of FEM meshes and functions

dependent_to.name: apptainer
dependent_to.description:
Apptainer is an open source container platform designed to be simple,
fast, and secure. Many container platforms are available, but Apptainer
is designed for ease-of-use on shared systems and in high performance
computing (HPC) environments. Needs post-install chmod/chown steps to
enable full functionality. See package definition or `spack-build-
out.txt` build log for details, e.g.:: tail -15 $(spack location -i
apptainer)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt

dependent_to.name: glusterfs
dependent_to.description:
Gluster is a software defined distributed storage that can scale to
several petabytes. It provides interfaces for object, block and file
storage.

dependent_to.name: bcache
dependent_to.description:
Bcache is a patch for the Linux kernel to use SSDs to cache other block
devices.

dependent_to.name: glib
dependent_to.description:
GLib provides the core application building blocks for libraries and
applications written in C. The GLib package contains a low-level
libraries useful for providing data structure handling for C,
portability wrappers and interfaces for such runtime functionality as an
event loop, threads, dynamic loading and an object system.

dependent_to.name: gaudi
dependent_to.description: An experiment-independent HEP event data processing framework

dependent_to.name: psm
dependent_to.description: Intel Performance scaled messaging library

dependent_to.name: czmq
dependent_to.description: A C interface to the ZMQ library

dependent_to.name: flux-sched
dependent_to.description: A scheduler for flux-core (pre-alpha)

dependent_to.name: singularity
dependent_to.description:
Singularity is a container technology focused on building portable
encapsulated environments to support "Mobility of Compute" For older
versions of Singularity (pre 3.0) you should use singularity-legacy,
which has a different install base (Autotools). Needs post-install
chmod/chown steps to enable full functionality. See package definition
or `spack-build-out.txt` build log for details, e.g. tail -15 $(spack
location -i singularity)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt

dependent_to.name: serf
dependent_to.description:
Apache Serf - a high performance C-based HTTP client library built upon
the Apache Portable Runtime (APR) library

dependent_to.name: cdo
dependent_to.description:
CDO is a collection of command line Operators to manipulate and analyse
Climate and NWP model Data.

dependent_to.name: guacamole-server
dependent_to.description:
The guacamole-server package is a set of software which forms the basis
of the Guacamole stack. It consists of guacd, libguac, and several
protocol support libraries.

dependent_to.name: swipl
dependent_to.description:
SWI-Prolog is a versatile implementation of the Prolog language.
Although SWI-Prolog gained its popularity primarily in education, its
development is mostly driven by the needs for application development.
This is facilitated by a rich interface to other IT components by
supporting many document types and (network) protocols as well as a
comprehensive low-level interface to C that is the basis for high-level
interfaces to C++, Java (bundled), C#, Python, etc (externally
available). Data type extensions such as dicts and strings as well as
full support for Unicode and unbounded integers simplify smooth exchange
of data with other components.

dependent_to.name: fontconfig
dependent_to.description: Fontconfig is a library for configuring/customizing font access

dependent_to.name: pulseaudio
dependent_to.description:
PulseAudio is a sound system for POSIX OSes, meaning that it is a proxy
for your sound applications. PulseAudio is a sound system for POSIX
OSes, meaning that it is a proxy for your sound applications. It allows
you to do advanced operations on your sound data as it passes between
your application and your hardware. Things like transferring the audio
to a different machine, changing the sample format or channel count and
mixing several sounds into one are easily achieved using a sound server.

dependent_to.name: dia
dependent_to.description: Dia is a program for drawing structured diagrams.

dependent_to.name: rsyslog
dependent_to.description: The rocket-fast Syslog Server.

dependent_to.name: coin3d
dependent_to.description:
Coin is an OpenGL-based, 3D graphics library that has its roots in the
Open Inventor 2.1 API, which Coin still is compatible with.

dependent_to.name: oci-systemd-hook
dependent_to.description:
OCI systemd hook enables users to run systemd in docker and OCI
compatible runtimes such as runc without requiring --privileged flag.

dependent_to.name: davix
dependent_to.description: High-performance file management over WebDAV/HTTP.

dependent_to.name: singularityce
dependent_to.description:
Singularity is a container technology focused on building portable
encapsulated environments to support "Mobility of Compute" For older
versions of Singularity (pre 3.0) you should use singularity-legacy,
which has a different install base (Autotools). Needs post-install
chmod/chown steps to enable full functionality. See package definition
or `spack-build-out.txt` build log for details, e.g. tail -15 $(spack
location -i singularity)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt

dependent_to.name: xrootd
dependent_to.description:
The XROOTD project aims at giving high performance, scalable fault
tolerant access to data repositories of many kinds.

dependent_to.name: cryptsetup
dependent_to.description: Cryptsetup and LUKS - open-source disk encryption.

dependent_to.name: taskd
dependent_to.description: TaskWarrior task synchronization daemon

dependent_to.name: libsm
dependent_to.description: libSM - X Session Management Library.
